About Me

Juan Camilo Henao Londono

I am a Colombian guy who enjoy to learn, travel and practice sports. I made my B. Sc. and my M. Sc. in the National University of Colombia at Manizales. During my master I lived around one year in Montreal. I worked as lecturer in the National University of Colombia in Manizales and the Autonomous University of Manizales. Currently, I am a Ph. D. student at the University of Duisburg-Essen in Germany. In this website I want to show you a little of my professional life and share some experiences and knowdlege.

My Career

University of Duisburg-Essen

During the summer semester I solve the exercises of the Econophysics course that is coordinated by the Research Group Guhr. In the winter semester I teach the Data Analysis Laboratory coordinated by the Faculty of Physics.

April, 2019 - Present
Econophysics exercises and data analysis laboratory - Lecturer

University of Duisburg-Essen

I work in a really new and interesting field of physics: econophysics. Econophyics is an interdisciplinary research field that uses concepts in physics to solve problems in economics. You can take a look of my work in my GitHub repository.

October, 2018 - Present
Ph. D. Physics - Student

National University of Colombia at Manizales

I taught physics, physics laboratory and calculus in the Faculty of Exact and Natural Sciences for engineering.

February 2015 - June 2018
Physics and calculus - Lecturer

Autonomous University of Manizales

I taught physics, physics laboratory and calculus in the Department of Physics and Mathematics for engineering.

January 2017 - May 2018
Physics and calculus - Lecturer

National University of Colombia at Manizales

Postgraduate Diploma. One year learning about management and projects. A small break from physics to learn something from a different field.

August 2015 - August 2016
PgD. Strategic Project Management - Student

National University of Colombia at Manizales

During my Master I worked on scanning electron microscopy and image processing. I made an internship in the Image Processing Laboratory at the University of Montreal. Here you can check my thesis.

August 2012 - August 2015
M. Sc. Physics - Student

National University of Colombia at Manizales

My first serious step in the academy. My Bachelor was an amazing time to learn the basics and discover a new world.

August 2007 - August 2012
B. Sc. Engineering Physics - Student
